mil3.5.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.7:0.3_0: Their nose is hinders, filthy, and appropriated.
mil3.5.7:1.2_0: “Since you have all this escape from here, would you make one another?”
mil3.5.7:1.4_0: “Sir, if you have an elephant released from this body to the crowned and the bonds of bad, violent, and decrepit?”
mil3.5.7:1.5_0: “Great king, if you are not coming, they’re free from greed, hate, and delusion, but you’re exempt from evil.”
mil3.5.7:2.2_0: “Great king, if they were to fall away from a certain person’s mango grove, what would they get once?”
mil3.5.7:2.4_0: “Great king, why wouldn’t that mango tree took those mangoes?
mil3.5.7:2.5_0: “We will be born by a mango grove.”
mil3.5.7:2.6_0: “In the same way, there are deeds called _paṇḍaka_. After doing exist because of this, it’s not easy to do, for what they’re exempt from name and form.”
mil3.5.7:4.1_0: is the seventh substance of the body.
